releaseNotes: - build: updated gradle, plugins, build tools, targetsdk and minsdk (Android <10 can use v2.2.0 and below)
- virtual memory: increased max zram size and adapted to device ram size, for better integration with Samsung's RAM Plus setting
- device: add few more strings for alternate ASV detection (snapdragon wise)
- others: disable gpu freq on main screen, code cleanup
